Label: What kind of draft order do you need to upload?

Use the ['general application event'](case/${[JURISDICTION]}/${[CASE_TYPE]}/${[CASE_REFERENCE]}/trigger/createGeneralApplication) if you need to upload a draft order to:
  • apply to adjourn a hearing
  • ask for an order within proceedings
Use the ['consent application event'](case/${[JURISDICTION]}/${[CASE_TYPE]}/${[CASE_REFERENCE]}/trigger/FR_consentOrder) if you need to upload a consent order to finalise the contested proceedings.
